title: Help & Documentation
subtitle: Learn how to use SQLite Search effectively

content.intro: SQLite Search is a desktop application for performing full-text searches on SQLite databases using FTS5.
features: Fast full-text search powered by SQLite FTS5
Support for boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT)
content.tech: Built with Vue 3, Vuetify 3, and Electron

content.intro: Follow these steps to start searching your database:
steps: Click the database button in the header to select your SQLite file
Choose an FTS5 table from the dropdown (only FTS5 tables are shown)
Select which columns to search (TEXT columns auto-selected by default)
Enter your search term and press Enter or click the search button
View results in the table below - click rows for details

content.intro: SQLite Search requires databases with FTS5 (Full-Text Search 5) virtual tables.
requirements: Database must contain at least one FTS5 virtual table
Regular SQLite tables will not appear in the selector
FTS5 tables are created using: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE ... USING fts5(...)
content.note: If no tables appear after selecting your database, verify it contains FTS5 virtual tables using any SQLite browser tool.

content.tip: Combine operators for complex queries: (gene OR protein) AND NOT obsolete

content.intro: Search results are displayed in an interactive table:
features: Click column headers to sort results
Use the eye icon to view full record details
Use the copy icon to copy field values to clipboard
Adjust visible columns with the COLUMNS button
Clear results with the CLEAR button
content.pagination: Large result sets are paginated - use the controls at the bottom to navigate.

content.intro: Your searches are automatically saved for quick access:
features: Click the history icon in the header to view past searches
Each entry shows the search term, result count, and context
Click RESTORE to re-run a previous search
Delete individual entries or clear all history
content.note: History is stored locally and persists across sessions.

content.intro: Customize the application to your preferences:

options.name: Theme Toggle
options.description: Switch between light and dark mode

options.name: Auto-select TEXT
options.description: Automatically select TEXT columns for searching

options.name: Reset State
options.description: Clear all selections and return to initial state

content.persistence: All preferences are saved automatically and restored on next launch.

issues.solution: Ensure your database contains FTS5 virtual tables, not regular tables
Try simpler terms, use wildcards (*), or check column selection
Check FTS5 syntax - special characters may need quoting
Large result sets take time - try narrowing your search
